name: [Early Access] Little War: Battles
description:
Early Access] (battles) This game is in early access.

Fight, Win, Conquer.
Immerse yourself into an open 2D Battle Royale Pixel Art World!

*Factions
Pick a side in this great war story! Choose between the noble Draxian or the fierce Naru.

*PvP
Face other players in the open world or compete in the ranked arena and earn prizes & rewards.


*Pixel Art
Enjoy a 2d pixel art world full of magical landscape.

Recent belic encounters have unleashed a new era of war between the Draxians and the Naru.

Stand together with the noble Draxian warriors, those who fight for justice and order.
Or fight side by side with the ancestral tribe Naru, defending nature and the balance in the universe.


You can join our community in facebook and share your experience: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1176593055751919/

For more information visit our sites:
* Main Page: http://littlewaronline.com
* Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/littlewaronline

Play in PC: http://littlewaronline.com/download

Download for PC and Web: http://littlewaronline.com/download
